alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 7:33PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. .Minor flooding will persist through Wednesday at the Red River at Oslo due to snowmelt. Action stage is anticipated by Thursday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Oslo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM CDT Monday was 29.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue rising to 26.3 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
